summary: Adds Open Lock spells to the game.
descriptionHtml:
Adds Open Lock spells to the game. The tomes can be bought from vendors and found in random loot throughout Skyrim. Works with all mods and DLC. 

I made this version seperate from the first version because I completely remade the mod from scratch using a different (much better) method. Now it should be compatible with all mods and DLC. If you are upgrading from the first version, before you install this version I recommend you load your save, open the console, type 

help \'\'Open level Lock\'\' (where level is Novice, Apprentice, Adept, Expert, or Master) 

and press enter to get the spell IDs, and remove each of the spells from your character by entering 

player.removespell spell_ID (where spell_ID is the ID you got from the first command) 

into the console for each spell. Then make a save, exit Skyrim, uninstall the first version, and then install this version. 

Old version is here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9218

Change Log
==========
2.0 - Initial release
2.01 - Open Master Lock spell tome should now be available for purchase from Tolfdir after completing the Alteration ritual quest at the College of Winterhold
author: Leazer425
